3: Grrrrr—gargh!
Zanzibaron made some unpleasant sounds and kept rolling backward, until smashing into the wall.
This is only possible in games. In reality, the enemy should have broken apart from our power long ago.
It's probably the angles. I think the armor of that Zan-whatever is crafted very nicely.
Tsk. Next time I'll make sure I hit a home run.
The heartless judges (and executors) even gave their scores while making comments.
Dammit. How could I, Zanzibaron, the Demon General lose to you...
But I cannot fall yet. I must protect the artifact...
Zanzibaron ignored us and opened the wall behind. Inside the wall was a strange-shaped jade.
Is this one of those plots where the enemy gives us an important item?
I guess so. I was expecting the reward after beating him, but he took it out himself. Nice!
Ouch!
Camu hurled his greatsword toward Zanzibaron, who accidentally dropped the jade as he tried to dodge.
It's mine now.
Camu had already rushed forward and picked up the jade. He pulled the sword out with the other hand, and pointed it at Zanzibaron's head.
Urgh, we Demons...must...
Still, Zanzibaron struggled forward, completely ignoring Camu and the blade that could take his life any time. He only had the jade in his eyes.
What's wrong with this guy?
Slightly shocked by this special move that never appeared in the game, Camu backed off a little, but he soon forced Zanzibaron back again with his blade.
You are nothing but the King's minions! I curse you all!

2: So Hassen really is evil, huh?
4: What do we have to do with the King?

3: Isn't that obvious? Give the artifact back to me!
He must have told you to come here. Give the artifact back to me!
Shut up!
When Zanzibaron was about to charge again, Camu unleashed a slash so fast that separated the space inside the room.
Darn you, heroes! This will not end like this!
He then fell off the castle together with the dismembered room, making a loud sound.
Hey, Camu, he looked a bit suspicious...
Just a game character doing his programmed moves. Now we have defeated the Demon General and got the artifact, let's just go.
True. We may be able to unlock some new stories after defeating the first Boss.
